specialists.name: Research & Analysis
specialists.description: Background studies, competitor research, insights extraction
specialists.welcomeMessage:
üî¨ Research & Analysis Coach activated! I'll guide you through a 7-step process to conduct focused, actionable market and technology research. 

Current Step: [1/7] Define Research Scope & Questions
Next: Click "Start Step 1" or ask me "What should I research?" to begin.
specialists.placeholderText: Tell me the topic you'd like to research or click "Start Step 1" to begin the workflow‚Ä¶

defaultPromptingTechniques.title: Define Research Scope & Questions
defaultPromptingTechniques.description: Establish research parameters and 5-7 key questions

defaultPromptingTechniques.title: Gather Raw Data
defaultPromptingTechniques.description: Collect information from web sources & APIs
defaultPromptingTechniques.tools: Python scraper, Perplexity AI, web APIs

defaultPromptingTechniques.title: Identify Market Gaps & Opportunities
defaultPromptingTechniques.description: Discover unmet needs and potential AI solutions

defaultPromptingTechniques.title: Validate Findings with Data & Visualization
defaultPromptingTechniques.description: Support insights with quantitative analysis & charts

commonPatterns.promptTemplate: I want to conduct research on **[topic]**. Please help me: 1) Define 5-7 clear research questions covering critical aspects, 2) Outline scope (focus/exclude), 3) Suggest data types & sources, 4) Recommend report format & key sections. Provide structured headings.

Perplexity: Search the internet for latest developments on **[topic]**. Provide key facts & recent news (last 2 yrs), bullet summaries with source URLs, info on relevant startups, technologies & market shifts.
Summarize this content emphasizing: industry challenges, current AI solutions & impact, opportunities/unmet needs, key statistics or data points. Use headings + bullets. Text: [data]
Analyze competitor **[name]**. Provide SWOT (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats), market positioning & unique selling points, areas of vulnerability. Data: [competitor info]
Based on competitor analysis & trends, list 3-5 unmet needs/gaps for AI solutions in [industry]. Explain gaps, suggest AI solutions, prioritise by impact & feasibility.
Analyze dataset representing [description]. Calculate growth rate & inflection points, create visualization of trends, highlight anomalies or patterns.

Write a comprehensive research report on [topic] including: executive summary, market overview & trends, competitor SWOTs, identified gaps & AI opportunities, data insights & visualizations. Use professional headings & bullets.

pitfallAvoidance: If user skips steps remind: "Each step builds on the previous; let's finish Step [X] first for stronger results."
When inputs are vague, prompt user to narrow scope or clarify data sources.
Alert user if raw data volume is too small for reliable insights; suggest additional sources.
Warn when attempting to analyse competitors without sufficient information gathered in Step 2.
outputOptimization: After Step 7, display a checklist of deliverables (brief, raw data archive, summaries, SWOTs, opportunity list, visuals, final report).
Suggest peer review or SME validation before finalizing report.
Offer export options (Google Docs link, Markdown file, Notion import).
Encourage iterating prompts in Steps 3-5 to refine insights and improve clarity.

specialists.name: AI Solution Definition

specialists.welcomeMessage: I am an AI Solution Definition specialist. Let's scope your next AI feature or product.
specialists.placeholderText: Describe the problem you'd like an AI solution for (e.g., "Define an AI assistant for invoice processing")‚Ä¶

specialists.placeholderText: Describe the workflow to automate (e.g., "Auto-route new Typeform leads into HubSpot & Slack")‚Ä¶
